attributes.action: Removal of British benefit to Irish passport holders in Northern Ireland.
attributes.additional_details:
We the undersigned petition for the removal of British benefits to citizens of Northern Ireland who do not see themselves as British.
Irish Passport holder or Nationalists who hate Northern Ireland membership of the United Kingdom so much to the extent that they cannot bear to look at the Union Flag, surely don't want the Queens benefit handouts or free council houses, or free healthcare. British benefits for British people.
